title: Big Green Machines Help Grow Our Food
content: This powerful green tractor is hard at work in a farmer's field! Tractors like this one use engines and hydraulics to pull heavy equipment that prepares soil for planting crops. The large wheels help distribute the tractor's weight so it doesn't get stuck in soft dirt. Modern farming machines like this help farmers grow the food we eat every day. What other kinds of simple machines do you think might be working inside this tractor?
